Parameters: int: the start-offset of the data in the buffer.
int: the amount of data (in bytes) in the buffer.
long: the presentation timestamp in microseconds.

int: buffer flags associated with the buffer. This should be a combination of @B_android#media#MediaCodec#BUFFER_FLAG_KEY_FRAME_E@ and @B_android#media#MediaCodec#BUFFER_FLAG_END_OF_STREAM_E@. Value is either 0 or a combination of @B_android#media#MediaCodec#BUFFER_FLAG_SYNC_FRAME_E@, @B_android#media#MediaCodec#BUFFER_FLAG_KEY_FRAME_E@, @B_android#media#MediaCodec#BUFFER_FLAG_CODEC_CONFIG_E@, @B_android#media#MediaCodec#BUFFER_FLAG_END_OF_STREAM_E@, @B_android#media#MediaCodec#BUFFER_FLAG_PARTIAL_FRAME_E@, and android.media.MediaCodec.BUFFER_FLAG_MUXER_DATA
set(int,int,long,int).FullName: public void set (int newOffset, int newSize, long newTimeUs, int newFlags)

Parameters: int: the start-offset of the data in the buffer.

long: the presentation timestamp in microseconds.
int: buffer flags associated with the buffer. This should be a combination of @B_android#media#MediaCodec#BUFFER_FLAG_KEY_FRAME_E@ and @B_android#media#MediaCodec#BUFFER_FLAG_END_OF_STREAM_E@.
set(int, int, long, int).FullName: public void set (int newOffset, int newSize, long newTimeUs, int newFlags)

ClassDesc: Per buffer metadata includes an offset and size specifying the range of valid data in the associated codec (output) buffer.
